sentence: Ms. PRESSLEY. Mr. Speaker, as part of the Congressional Field Hearing  on Haitian TPS Termination held in the Massachusetts 7th Congressional  District, witnesses from the community were invited to discuss the  importance of extending TPS for Haitian nationals. Therefore, I include  in the Record their testimonies:…
